tool.name: SAGA.docs_pdf.2
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False isArrayLINES False isArrayOUTPUTPATH False output_data_SECTIONS $output_data_SECTIONS name SAGA.docs_pdf.2 DEM $DEM LINES $LINES NUMPOINTS $NUMPOINTS INTERVAL $INTERVAL STEP $STEP PDF $PDF OUTPUTPATH $OUTPUTPATH WIDTH $WIDTH SLOPE $SLOPE THRESHOLD $THRESHOLD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_SECTIONS $OutputSection_SECTIONS.outputType_SECTIONS transmissionMode_SECTIONS $OutputSection_SECTIONS.transmissionMode_SECTIONS

param.name: DEM
param.label: DEM
param.help: Digital Terrain Model The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: LINES
param.label: Path
param.help: Path The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json, xml

param.name: NUMPOINTS
param.label: Number of points
param.help: Number of points on each side of the section

param.name: STEP
param.label: n
param.help: Draw a section each n points

param.name: OUTPUTPATH
param.label: Folder for PDF Files
param.help: Folder for PDF Files The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: THRESHOLD
param.label: Height Threshold
param.help: Height threshold for optimal profile calculation

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_SECTIONS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SECTIONS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
